sentences.sentence: 'Well, just for a little while then,' she said, finally relenting.
sentences.translation: “好吧，不过只能待一会儿。”她最后终于答应了。

sentences.sentence: "I know you meant to be kind," she said, relenting, "so you may give me a kiss."
sentences.translation: “我知道你的本意是好的，”她说，变得温和了，“所以你可以给我一个吻。”

sentences.sentence: "Of course it is Saturday night, Peter," Wendy said, relenting.
sentences.translation: “彼得，今天当然是星期六晚上。”温迪温柔的说。
